title: Himawari - The Sunflower -
notes: Strange display glitch, that looks sort of like tearing but is persistent for a few seconds then goes away (and comes back), and occurs even when there is no motion. Doesn't affect Nvidia cards/drivers. Otherwise perfect.

title: Himawari - The Sunflower -
notes: Graphics and voices perfect, but OP FMV results in a black screen but it can be skipped with the enter key. You can just watch it here instead: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fTkwNLMVsPI
